personal details.title: Enrique
personal details.subtitle: Enrique Choynowski Melgarejo
personal details.about:
Bachelor's at Control and Automation Engineering from Pontifícia Universidade Católica do Rio Grande do Sul (2013), developed research projects in software development and wireless networking analysis. Currently undergraduate at Internet System at Universidade Luterana do Brasil.

With experience in developing applications for iOS, Node.js, Windows 8 and Windows Phone.

Has joined BEPiD(Brazilian Education Program for iOS Developers) offered by Instituto Eldorado and PUCRS in partnership with Apple.
Looking for obtain as much experience as possible in the subjects above, as well as mastering the subjects learned during graduation, focusing on researches and innovation projects.

info.title: About
info.text:

education.title: ULBRA
education.subtitle: Universidade Luterana do Brasil
education.about: Currently, at the second year of graduation on Internet Systems at Universidade Luterana do Brasil. As the needed to deal with the digital engines for development and management of websites, I could see an enormous potential for website's problem's solutions. By the end of the graduation, im expecting acquire the knowledge needed for developing solutions, interfaces and applications directed for web.

education.title: PUCRS
education.subtitle: Pontifícia Universidade Católica do Rio Grande do Sul
education.about:
Bachelor's at Control and Automation Engineering from Pontifícia Universidade Católica do Rio Grande do Sul by 2013. 

The engineer projects, manages and operates equipments used during the production process of industry. Through the graduation, I gained the knowledge of how to develop and train my skills, as well as improved my logical reasoning, my desire of develop projects and automate processes.

The engineering has provided me the knowledge needed to gain space among the development of software and mobile applications, as I had already gone through the process of learning and had experience in learning by myself.

education.title: CTBM
education.subtitle: Colégio Tiradentes da Brigada Militar
education.about:
Graduated at school by 2006 at Escola Militar de Porto Alegre(Brasil) Colégio Tiradentes da Brigada Militar.

With extra-class activities and a strict discipline, the school stimulated my determination, responsibility and study hard. It opened up my eyes to the huge range of opportunities at the beginning of my studies. Was during this period that I decided to study engineering.

experience.title: Superplayer
experience.subtitle: Lead iOS Engineer
experience.about: Superplayer is a great way to listen to music. You hear your favorite songs in playlists Free made for every moment of your life just a click away.

info.title: About
info.text:
Superplayer is a service that provides online music streaming. Superplayer belongs to 3BR Tech company. The service provides custom radio stations and playlists created by specialists, organized by genre, activities or mood.

During two months, I already improved my agile methodology, scrum and how to deal with an application that has millions of users.

experience.title: GreenB
experience.subtitle: CEO / Backend developer / iOS developer
experience.about: Startup founded by my group from BEPiD and I. The company will be used to commercialize the Aproximar app as well as developing, prototyping and releasing innovated projects.

info.title: About
info.text: Startup founded by my group from BEPiD and I. The company will be used to commercialize the Aproximar app as well as developing, prototyping and releasing innovated projects.

experience.title: BEPiD
experience.subtitle: Brazilian Education Program for iOS Development
experience.about: This one year program aims to form iOS developers in order to create apps for the brazilian AppStore. My group and I were selected to continue our main project in the BEPiD's second edition. In this company I worked as iOS developer, developing applications, databases and web-services. All activities were performed using agile methods like Scrum and CBL.

experience.title: Ciberbras
experience.subtitle: Mobile Application Developer
experience.about: Development and management of an iOS application, developed over the Xamarin platform. With the goal of exchanging information in a secure way, the solution allows to establish a secure exchange of messages in a encrypted ambient

experience.title: Elipse Software
experience.subtitle: Software Developer
experience.about:
Helping over the development, management and tests of a client-server system with mobile applications, focusing over the management, supervision and control of industrial processes and energy.

Server in C++11 for Windows with secure connection (https) and RESTful API data.

Clients: Web client (Browser) (jQuery and HTML5), Windows Phone 8.1 (C# .NET 4.5), Android 4.4 (Java), iOS (iPhone and iPad) (Objective-C).

info.title: About
info.text:
Helping over the development, management and tests of a client-server system with mobile applications, focusing over the management, supervision and control of industrial processes and energy.

Server in C++11 for Windows with secure connection (https) and RESTful API data.

Clients: Web client (Browser) (jQuery and HTML5), Windows Phone 8.1 (C# .NET 4.5), Android 4.4 (Java), iOS (iPhone and iPad) (Objective-C).

projects.title: Superplayer
projects.subtitle: iOS Application
projects.about:
Superplayer is an online radio station, in which users can find custom radio stations and playlists developed by specialists for every moment and mood.

Application in which I have been using knowledge in Core Data, background tasks, streaming of music,MapKit and pods, for maintain the application which millions of users use everyday secure and solid.

projects.title: Aproximar
projects.subtitle: iOS Application
projects.about: This project aims to facilitate the communication between schools and parents through mobile applications. With a simple and intuitive interface, the application is developed on 5 friends, where I am the team leader and responsible for the entire backend(web service, data base and infrastructure). Besides that, I am helping over the development of the iOS application. We are currently validating an MVP(Minimum viable product) with our app on TestFlight.

projects.title: NoWastes
projects.subtitle: iOS Application
projects.about: NoWastes is an app that helps the users to check the expiration date of their products. Knowlodge: Image download/upload, local notifications, data persistence in CoreData, advertising and user experience.

NoWastes is an app that helps the users to check the expiration date of their products. 

Knowlodge: Image download/upload, local notifications, data persistence in CoreData, advertising and user experience.

projects.title: GoGo Birdie!
projects.subtitle: iOS Application
projects.about: GoGo Birdie! is a game developed using Sprite Kit. In this project we used: Sprite Kit and Google Admob. It is a really challenging game where you have to guide a bird through waves of bad birds.

projects.title: Sikur
projects.subtitle: Xamarin Application
projects.about: A complete messaging system for secure information exchange between users, groups and businesses, while ensuring that shared data has total privacy. Senders and receivers can be secure in the knowledge that their messages will not be tampered with between source and destination.

info.subtitle: Ciberbras

projects.title: Elipse Mobile
projects.subtitle: iOS Application
projects.about:
Elipse Mobile is a mobile platform for integration with automation systems, which lets you monitor variables and command your process’s devices.

Native clients for iOS, Android and Windows Phone and a WebApp in HTML and Javascript.

Server in C++11 for Windows.

info.title: Elipse Mobile
info.subtitle: Elipse Software
info.text:
Elipse Mobile is a mobile platform for integration with automation systems, which lets you monitor variables and command your process’s devices.

Native clients for iOS, Android and Windows Phone and a WebApp in HTML and Javascript.

Server in C++11 for Windows.

projects.title: Run Shadow
projects.subtitle: iOS Application
projects.about: Run Shadow is an Endless Runner game made with Unity3D for Smartphones and Tablets (iOS, Android and Windows)

info.title: Run Shadow
info.subtitle: Enrique Choynowski Melgarejo
info.text:
Run Shadow is an Endless Runner game made with Unity3D for Smartphones and Tablets (iOS, Android and Windows)

Features:
- Challenging, randomized maps
- Beautiful 2D graphics
- Simple controls
- Online Highscores
- Many Characters and Maps to unlock

skills.title: Development Systems with Windows 8

Joined a course for mastering development of windows 8 applications.This course specifically stimulated me for developing mobile applications, as it was my very first contact with mobile development, leading me afterwards to get in contact with iOS development.

Finishing as the best student among the course.

honororawards.title: 3rd Place - 8º Torneio Empreendedor PUCRS
honororawards.subtitle: Entrepreneurship Tournament
honororawards.about: Award achieved with the Aproximar project.The Torneio Empreendedor PUCRS was designed to stimulate the entrepreneurship culture at the PUCRS University. This project allows students from diverse academic areas to put into practice the knowledge acquired through the tournament.

info.title: About
info.text:
Award achieved with the Aproximar project.

The Torneio Empreendedor PUCRS was designed to stimulate the entrepreneurship culture at the PUCRS University. This project allows students from diverse academic areas to put into practice the knowledge acquired through the tournament.
